artist: Artist: Itō Shinsui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō; Printer: Ono Gintarō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: portrait; seated woman wearing a blue and white kimono and a red and white obi, holding a fan with red flowers in her PR hand
markings: red artist\'s seal: 月白山荘 {Getsuhaku Sanshō}; publisher seal: 渡辺木版美術画舖工作 {Watanabe mokuhan bijutsu gaho kōsaku} (produced by Watanabe woodblock print art store); printer seal: 摺師　斧銀太郎 {surishi Ono Gintarō} (printer Ono Gintarō)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Ideal Japanese Woman
